bibl.seg: SIRKS A.J.B. and K.A. WORP (Edd.), with the assistance of R.S. BAGNALL and R.P. SALOMONS, Papyri in Memory of P.J. Sijpesteijn (P. Sijp.). (American Studies in Papyrology. 40.)
[Oakville, Connecticut], American Society of Papyrologists, 2007, 4°, xlii-445 pp. et 74 pll. dont 9 dépl. ISBN 978-0-9700591-0-9. $110.
P. Sijp. 1-61. - Pp. vii-viii: The Editors, Preface [January, 2000]; - xv-xlii: Bibliography of P.J. Sijpesteijn.
